column4: Hi - at the moment I have win7 and 12.10 as a dual boot system with selection via a grub2 splash screen.. If I update the win7 to win8 will I be able to get the boot selection with grub2 back
I have read somewhere that win8 demands a reboot into the alternative OS - anybody know about this...?
please don't send me to #windows - because -there the moment I mention ubuntu they wills end me here.. ;=)
Not sure if W8 has changed but I had a tryout install about 6 months ago with no boot problems, W8 booted really fast, not sure if it was using a hybrid sleep.
